title: Falling Skies
description: In the heart of Boston, following the devastating events of an alien invasion, history professor Tom Mason and his sons meet up with the 2nd Mass, a militia group determined to wipe out the aliens. But with the militia's supplies running low, Tom must locate an old friend to equip him and his team in order to ensure the survival of the human race! * Falling Skies is from DreamWorks Television and stars Noah Wyle*
author: Paul Tobin
